resources.string:
Hi! 
My name is Ekaterina. 
I am 23. 
This is an application about me. 
I live in Russia, Murom. 
I am a photographer. 
I have a mother, a father and a sister. 
I have also a boyfriend. His name is Roma, he is a programmer. 
Roma is 22 years old. 
Roma has a cat, its name is Dasha.
